title: The English inn
creator_credit: Muriel Baker, James Carr, Sydney Box and Verity Films
brief_description: The inn is the centre of life in the towns and villages of England. Carved designs and paintings by artists of long ago can still be seen today in these inns. Most of the more pretentious inns were built along the old coaching routes, where they formed a vital part of the communication system.
